long_description: The Amphipod RunLite AirStretch 4 hydration belt grips your hips in breathable comfort. Chafe-free edging and rip-and-stick front closure make it an A-list training partner for your runs. AirStretch belt comes with 4 docking bases that each hold an 8 fl. oz. flask; wide 43mm mouths make flasks easy to fill and clean. Docking bases are securely attached to the bounce-free belt and allow vertical and horizontal bottle-attachment positions, so you can configure the system the way you want. Each SnapFlask(TM) bottle snaps into docking base and releases with a simple squeeze, providing effortless access to your fluids. Polyethylene flasks are 100% BPA free. The Amphipod RunLite AirStretch 4 hydration belt features a Rapid Access stash pouch to hold your cell phone, music player, keys, ID, cash or snacks.
